english: Whoever 's it was , it is now mine .
chinese: 不管从前是谁的，现在是我的。
是谁的形象把赌博神圣化了？

english: Whosever it was , it is now mine .
chinese: 不管从前是谁的，现在是我的。

english: She knew whose footsteps they were .
chinese: 她知道这是谁的脚步声。

english: "whose castle is that?" he asked of a boy .
chinese: “这是谁的城堡？”他问一个孩子。
谁的造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: He would listen to no expostulations .
Stand back to back and let us see who 's taller .
chinese: 背靠背站好，看看谁的个子高。

english: I never saw a man in so wretched a condition .
chinese: 我从未见过有谁的境遇比他更凄惨。

english: One man cannot wrong another man .
I shall make it my business to find out who is responsible .
I guess it depends on whose ox is being gored !
chinese: 我猜想，这要看被刺死的是谁的公牛！

english: I burn with a desire to know whose children we can be .
chinese: 我急于要知道，咱们到底是谁的孩子。
